sqlMap.statement: SELECT EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS "EAISEVRINSTNCNAME" , EAISEVRIP AS "EAISEVRIP" , SEVRLSNPORTNAME AS "SEVRLSNPORTNAME" , FLOVRSEVRNAME AS "FLOVRSEVRNAME" , HOSTNAME AS "HOSTNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEP03 WHERE EAISEVRINSTNCNAME = #EAISevrInstncName#
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIEP03 SET EAISEVRIP = #eaiSevrIp#, SEVRLSNPORTNAME = #sevrLsnPortName#, FLOVRSEVRNAME = #flovrSevrName#, HOSTNAME = #hostName# WHERE EAISEVRINSTNCNAME = #eaiSevrInstncName#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIEP03( EAISEVRINSTNCNAME, EAISEVRIP, SEVRLSNPORTNAME, FLOVRSEVRNAME, HOSTNAME) VALUES( #eaiSevrInstncName#, #eaiSevrIp#, #sevrLsnPortName#, #flovrSevrName#, #hostName#)
